snippet: A police cruiser responding to a robbery report with its lights flashing and siren blaring struck a car at an intersection in the Columbus suburb of Upper Arlington early Friday.
abstract: Police cruiser responding to a robbery report with its lights flashing and siren blaring strikes a car at an intersection in the Columbus suburb of Upper Arlington, Ohio, killing six members of a family and injuring the officer.
lead_paragraph: A police cruiser responding to a robbery report with its lights flashing and siren blaring struck a car at an intersection in the Columbus suburb of Upper Arlington early Friday.

headline.main: Ohio: Six in Family Are Killed in Collision With Police Cruiser
headline.print_headline:
Ohio: Six in Family Are Killed
In Collision With Police Cruiser
